document.heading: Department of Health Functions Clarification Amendment Act of 2005

history.narrative: Law 16-90, the “Department of Health Functions Clarification Amendment Act of 2005”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 16-293 which was referred to the Committee on Health. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 6, 2005, and January 4, 2006, respectively. It was assigned Act No. 16-276 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 16-90 became effective on April 4, 2006.
